32 class CameraController : public Object, public Serializable {
33 public:
34  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
37 
39  enum MovementType {
40  kZoom,
41  kPan, // Keep camera in the same place, but move target
42  kTilt, // Rotate the camera about it's right vector, i.e., change the up vector
43  kTranslate, // Translate the entire camera forwards and backwards (dolly), or left/right (truck)
44  kRotate // Rotate the camera about a target point
45  };
46 
48  enum Direction {
49  kLeft,
50  kRight,
51  kUp,
52  kDown,
53  kForward,
54  kBackwards
55  };
56 
58  struct ControllerProfile: public Serializable{
59 
60  virtual QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;
61  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;
62 
64  tsl::robin_map<MovementType, bool> m_movementTypes;
65 
67  //Vector3g m_target;
68 
69  real_g m_zoomScaling = real_g(-0.25);
70  Vector3 m_translateScaling = Vector3(real_g(1.0), real_g(1.0), real_g(1.0));
71  Vector2 m_rotateScaling = Vector2(real_g(1.0), real_g(-1.0));
72  Vector2 m_panScaling = Vector2(real_g(-1.0), real_g(1.0));
73  Vector2 m_tiltScaling = Vector2(real_g(-1.0), real_g(1.0));
74  };
75
